name: Touhou Scientific Dream
description:
Controls: arrow keys to move, esc to pause, shift to focus, z to shoot, x to bomb.
Windows version are untested and might not work.

Credits
Artwork, game design, programming - Me, Cocoon.
Background music - Melody Man (Check them out, they do cool stuffs!)
Sound effects - Zun/Touhou Series (Subterranean Animism/The Great Fairy Wars)
